entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 20 with temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northeast 30 early this morning. High minus 20 with temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
